query.stmt: with a as ( select wm_concat(to_char(id)) file_ids,wm_concat(to_char(name)) file_names from sys_file where busi_type='BI_MANU' and busi_id=[manu_id]), b as ( select wm_concat(to_char(id)) attach_ids,wm_concat(to_char(name)) attach_names from sys_file where busi_type='BI_MANU_ATTACH' and busi_id=[manu_id] ) select bm.company, bm.author_one, bm.author_two, bm.author_three, bm.content,spu.name name, to_char(bm.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') create_time,bm.content_text, a.file_ids,a.file_names,b.attach_ids,b.attach_names from bi_manu bm left join sys_p_user spu on bm.job_num=spu.id left join a on 1=1 left join b on 1=1 where bm.id=[manu_id]
